title: Watch Face - Timezone
summary: Traditional watch face with Luxurious & traditional look, three extra time zones
description: Features: - Luxurious & traditional  Android Wear watch face, reminds you of pendant watch.- Two themes  , each has an elegantly crafted style.- Theme Elegant   has white background with rosiness clock hands.- Theme Luxury  has black background with golden clock hands.- Three indicators    to show time in different places, choose wherever you care.-Support both round and square watches.Timezone is a timeless masterpiece inspired by many traditional luxury watches, beautiful, elegant, and classic. Sometimes when you look at it, you could probably think you are wearing a real mechanical watch instead of a digital gadget on your wrist. Definitely different from digital Facer or Ticker, Timezone is the most classic Android Wear watch face you have ever used.Supported Devices:Timezone watch face supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.How to use Timezone:-Install the app from Google Play.-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings. -Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press your smart watch to choose Timezone . Note:Please rate us positive if you like our work.Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.comSeeing more details please refer the below  “Contact us”Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our watch faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.Or if you just feel not really like this model, please cancel your order within 15 mins and try other magic faces. Tips:✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).2. Uninstall the watchface.3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settingsAttention:- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.More magic faces:Feel free to check out our more face collections: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=magic+watchfaceContact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Twitter:https://twitter.com/MagicWatchfaceFacebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Web:http://www.magicwatchface.com/And more coming ways to find us:Instagram, Pinterest... Thank you for :We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
descriptionHTML:
Features:

- Luxurious & traditional Android Wear watch face, reminds you of pendant watch.

- Two themes , each has an elegantly crafted style.

- Theme Elegant has white background with rosiness clock hands.

- Theme Luxury has black background with golden clock hands.

- Three indicators to show time in different places, choose wherever you care.

-Support both round and square watches.


Timezone is a timeless masterpiece inspired by many traditional luxury watches, beautiful, elegant, and classic. Sometimes when you look at it, you could probably think you are wearing a real mechanical watch instead of a digital gadget on your wrist. Definitely different from digital Facer or Ticker, Timezone is the most classic Android Wear watch face you have ever used.


Supported Devices:

Timezone watch face supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.


How to use Timezone:

-Install the app from Google Play.
-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings.
-Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press your smart watch to choose Timezone .

Note:
Please rate us positive if you like our work.
Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.

Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our watch faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.
Or if you just feel not really like this model, please cancel your order within 15 mins and try other magic faces.

Tips:
✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the watchface.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settings

Attention:
- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.

More magic faces:
Feel free to check out our more face collections:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=magic+watchface
